sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Stack, Typography, Avatar, Card, Button, Grid, InputLabel, FormControl, Select, MenuItem } from '@mui/material'; // Assuming you're using Material UI
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import CardContent from '@mui/material/CardContent';


interface WelcomePageProps {
  backgroundImage?: string; // Optional string for background image path
}
const StyledCard = styled(Card)(({ theme }) => ({
  textAlign: 'center',
  width: '50%',
  padding: '20px',
  borderRadius: '10px',
  boxShadow: '0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
  backgroundImage: `url("path/to/default-background.jpg")`, // Replace with default background image
  backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat',
  backgroundPosition: 'center',
  backgroundSize: 'cover',
  filter: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? 'brightness(0.7)' : 'none', // Darken background on dark mode
}));

const Welcome = ({ backgroundImage }: WelcomePageProps): JSX.Element => {
  // Add any state or props you might need for the welcome page content

  return (
  <Box
    display="flex"
    justifyContent="center"
    alignItems="center"
    sx={{ height: '100vh' }}
  >
    <StyledCard>
      <CardContent>
        <Typography variant="h4" color="textPrimary" gutterBottom>
          Welcome to TechCorp!
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1">
          Here is what we do:
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          TechCorp empowers individuals and teams to achieve their goals through:
        </Typography>
        <Stack direction="row" spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
          <Typography variant="body2">Cutting-edge Technologies</Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            Stay ahead of the curve with access to the latest tools and advancements.
          </Typography>
        </Stack>
        <Stack direction="row" spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
          <Typography variant="body2">Streamlined Workflows</Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            Boost productivity and efficiency with our intuitive and collaborative platform.
          </Typography>
        </Stack>
        <Stack direction="row" spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
          <Typography variant="body2">Unmatched Support</Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            Get the guidance and assistance you need to succeed with our dedicated support team.
          </Typography>
        </Stack>
        <Stack direction="row" spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          <Button variant="contained" size="large" color="primary">
            Get Started
          </Button>
          <Button variant="outlined" size="large" color="primary">
            Contact Us
          </Button>
        </Stack>
      </CardContent>
    </StyledCard>
  </Box>
);}

export default Welcome;
